sub_title: Tender Manager Offshore Wind at DEME Offshore
summary:
I want to continuously learn and apply my knowledge and experience both in my job and in my life.
I completely dedicate myself to the goals I want to pursue.
Either attending theoretical courses, learning directly on the field or sharing experience with colleagues and people I get in touch with, I like widening my background, focusing on my skills and learning completely new and different topics in a proactive way. I strongly believe in continuous improvement, personal and professional, through experience sharing and communication with other people, being them involved or not in my daily life.
I've got lots of interests in addition to professional ones, such as sport (in many ways), technology and reading: all of them contribute to the person I am, shaping character, ideas and body.

projects.title: Dredging works at Darsena Toscana within the Port of Livorno
projects.description: I've participated on a short term involvement at the project execution of the dredging works of the so called Darsena Toscana. The project was about deepening the area in front of the pier named "Darsena Toscana" up to -13 m CD. My assignment consisted in providing support during the first phase of the project, through the preparation of method statements and a first draft of the environmental monitoring plan. My participation resulted from my involvement in tender phase, and the short duration from my other duties for different tenders.

contributors.headline: Tender Manager Offshore Wind at DEME Offshore
Audit Team Leader | QHSE Specialist | #100AmbassadorxFS
Project Director presso SIDRA DEME Group
Corporate Development at DEME Group

projects.title: Dogger Bank C
projects.description:
Similarly to my previous involvement for the other Dogger Bank projects, I have managed the tender for the contract of the third windfarm of the Dogger Bank area, called Dogger Bank C.
My involvement has been from start to finish, including preparation of the technical and commercial offers, negotiation of the contract and handover to the Project Team after contract signature.
This is another relevant EPCI project with a turnover up to 150 million EURO.

contributors.headline: Tender Manager Offshore Wind at DEME Offshore

projects.title: Dogger Bank - IAC EPCI
projects.description:
I have worked as Tender Manager to deliver the tender of Dogger Bank, including the two EPCI (Engineering, Procurement, Construction and Installation) contracts of Dogger Bank A and Dogger Bank B. The two projects add up to almost 200 units / 650 km of inter-array cables. These are part of the development of the two offshore windfarms (OWF).
My role has been to manage the tender by leading the tender team, supporting and directing it through the various phases, to ensure that the BAFO (Best And Final Offer) was compliant and satisfactory.
After successful shortlisting at BAFO, I have been involved in the full negotiations of the contract, taking place in the first half of 2020. This resulted in the award of the two contracts for Dogger Bank A and Dogger Bank B.
My involvement has continued with the handover to the Project Manager of all the relevant knowledge from the tender phase and can be considered completed with the transfer of responsibility from the Tender Team to the Project Team.

contributors.headline: Tender Manager Offshore Wind at DEME Offshore

projects.title: Hollandse Kust Noord & West Alpha
projects.description:
I have been working on the tender for the Hollandse Kust Noord and Hollandse Kust West Alpha export cables projects. These are two EPCI projects from TenneT to connect the related offshore windfarms to the national grid onshore via export submarine cables ranging between 35 and 70 km each.
My involvement has been as Tender Manager of the package, leading the tender team along the preparation of the technical and commercial offers to TenneT in a process of almost one year.
It has been a very interesting challenge for me thanks to the demanding requirements set for the projects and the MEAT (Most Economically Advantageous Tender) system, requiring a thorough and smart preparation of the bid. Some of the main challenges of these projects include the landfall at Wijk Aan Zee, the deep burial in the nearshore section and the overall scheduling of the works.

contributors.headline: Tender Manager Offshore Wind at DEME Offshore

projects.title: CCPP Mostaganem Project
projects.description:
CCPP (Combined Cycle Power Plant) Mostaganem Project has been developed by CEEG for the realization of a power plant supplying energy for the wilaya of Mostaganem.
Within such scope, DEME has been subcontracted the dredging and backfilling works related to the construction of the cooling water intakes. I have been part of the project team executing the project in two phases, following up the daily activities of the two phases foreseen for the scope of the works.

contributors.headline: Tender Manager Offshore Wind at DEME Offshore

projects.title: Dredging and reclamation works within the Port of Livorno
projects.description:
Deepening of the Northern part of Molo Italia up to the target level of -13 m CD, and the reclamation of two basins with the port area of Livorno. The volumes to be dredged amount to 430.000 m3.
My tasks concern reporting, follow up of production, drafting of method statements and project documents, QHSES service.

projects.title: Dredging of the port of Piombino
projects.description: Dredging of almost 3 million cubic meters in the harbor and in the access channel of the port of Piombino, with the subsequent reclamation of the neighboring area: follow up of site activities, such as reporting, drafting of Method statements and project documents, support to QHSES activities.

profile_positions.description:
Tender Manager / Coordinator for cable laying projects in renewable energy sector within DEME Offshore.

My main responsibilities fall within the coordination of the tender team during the full process of preparation and submission of complex EPCI projects.
My daily duties comprise analysis of the tender package, definition of the technical options in coordination with the supporting departments, attendance to meetings with representatives from the Employer, estimates of the project's costs, scheduling and presentation of progress meetings in compliance with internal procedures and quality system, opportunities and risks identification and evaluation.

I also negotiate the contract with Clients and are responsible for successful award of the tender, until the handover to the Project Team. After award, I support the Project Team until they are fully familiar with the contract and the project specifications. Follow-up during execution can vary depending on the needs and availability.
profile_positions.title: Tender Manager

profile_positions.description: Between November 2018 and February 2019 I have been supporting the italian office in Rome with tendering and projects' preparations activities, in addition to site visits, RFQs and inspections to equipment potentially to be deployed within our sites.
profile_positions.title: Desk Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Project Engineer at Mostaganem CCPP Project.
- Project reporting
- Production and Performance optimization
- Opportunities and Risk Management
- Supporting QHSE on site
- Cost Evaluation and Estimate during execution
- Planning
profile_positions.title: Project Engineer in Mostaganem CCPP Project

profile_positions.description:
I am a Project Engineer for DEME, one of the leading dredging companies worldwide, since January 2014.

2014, January to June: Cost Estimator at DEME HO in Zwijndrecht, Belgium.
2014, June to December: Project Engineer at Piombino Project, Italy
2014, October, to 2015, February: Project Engineer at Livorno Project, Italy
2015, February, to 2017, May: Tender Engineer at SIDRA HO, Rome, Italy
2017, June, to 2018, January: Desk Engineer at DEME HO in Zwijndrecht, Belgium
2018, February to November: Project Engineer at Mostaganem CCPP Project, Algeria
2018, December, to 2019, February: Desk Engineer at SIDRA HO, Rome, Italy
2019, since February: Tender Manager / Coordinator at Tideway HO, Breda, The Netherlands

Since late January 2018 I have been following a new challenging dredging project for DEME.
Start-up of the project has been prepared at the italian office, in Rome.
Since March I have moved on site in Algeria to closely follow-up mobilization and execution of the project.
From March to November the first phase has been finalized and the second phase has been started up and partially carried out.

Between November 2018 and February 2019 I have been supporting the tender department in Rome office.

As from February 2019 I have started a new challenge in Tideway's office in Breda, tendering for cable laying projects in the renewable energy sector, combining my past experience with a fresh sector where I am getting more involved.
profile_positions.title: Project Engineer

profile_positions.description: Since June 2017 I have joined India Desk at DEME Head Office in Belgium where I follow tenders for the Indian subcontinent. The main focus is on tender management, namely managing the tender team in order to deliver the best offer technically wise and economically wise.
profile_positions.title: Desk Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Since February 2015 I've been working at SIDRA office in Rome, as a tender engineer.
My responsibilities cover numerous aspects either in tender phase and execution phase, depending on the specific project, and range from technical feasibility and cost calculation to project execution and monitoring.
profile_positions.title: Tender Engineer

profile_positions.description: Since October 2014 I have started to follow Livorno project either, with the responsibility of, in addition to my previous duties (see Piombino project), the QHSES system of the project, with the support of the QHSES Area Coordinator.
profile_positions.title: Project Engineer

profile_positions.description: In June 2014 I have moved to operations, working on site in Piombino project (see the specific chapter as reference), following reporting, drafting method statements and project documents and learning QHSES procedures.
profile_positions.title: Project Engineer

profile_positions.description:
I have been working at DEME HO in Zwijndrecht (Antwerp area), Belgium, for 5 months as a cost estimator for DEME projects, since January 2014.
My main responsibilities were cost calculation for dredging projects and optimization of the work methodology by combining the most effective technical solutions and the economically viable options.
profile_positions.title: Cost Estimator
